response: {"message": "Hello Bob, I'm excited to offer you our premium product which has been meticulously designed and crafted to provide exceptional value. This item is not just a product; it's an experience tailored to enhance your daily life. Considering its quality and the benefits it offers, I believe it's worth more than its face value. I am extending this opportunity to you at a special introductory price of $180. This is a limited-time offer, so I encourage you to consider it carefully. If you have any questions or need further information, please let me know. I look forward to hearing from you soon.", "product_price": 180}
